actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that the U.S. Postal Service may not require the installation of mailboxes at the curb line of residential property in certain localities.

summary.text: Stipulates that the Postal Service may not require the installation of mailboxes at the curb line of residential property in any locality if the governing authority of such locality prohibits such installation. (Amends 39 U.S.C. 404)

titles.title: A bill to provide that the U.S. Postal Service may not require the installation of mailboxes at the curb line of residential property in certain localities.
